data.description: audit XSS vulnerability of web pages
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
HTML::XSSLint is a subclass of LWP::UserAgent to audit Cross Site
    Scripting (XSS) vulnerability by generating random input against
    HTML forms in a web page.

    This module is just a backend for xsslint tool bundled in the
    distribution.
